title: Practice Identifiers
body:
Practice Identifiers
  MediRecords allows you to store your Practice Identifier information, which could be from national registries or programs. For example, the Practice Incentive Program (PIP) which incentivises practices to undertake certain activities to improve the quality of their care. This tutorial will guide you to use that section.
To access a user's practice identifiers:

Click More and select Settings.
Click on Subscription Settings.



Click Practices to open the list of practices.


Check the box next to the name of the practice to reveal a list of options. Click Edit Practice.


Click on Identifiers. You will be brought to the Practice Identifiers screen.

 




Need assistance, please contact MediRecords support on 1300 103 903 during business hours OR email Support@medirecords.com
